mapper.select: select a.id as user_id, a.nickname as user_nickname, b.content, b.board_id, b.id from comments b join user a on a.id=b.user_id where b.board_id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into comments ( content, board_id, user_id) values ( #{content}, #{board_id}, #{user_id})
mapper.update: update comments set content=#{content} where id=#{id}
